title: Trump’s Potential Christmas Gift to Biden, Wall St. Silence on #MeToo Revolution
itunes:title: Trump’s Potential Christmas Gift to Biden, Wall St. Silence on #MeToo Revolution
description:
Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green discusses why the impeachment trial could be Donald Trump’s Christmas gift to Joe Biden. Dr. Tom Inglesby, Director of the Center for Health Security at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, talks about global pandemic preparedness. Katia Porzecanski, Bloomberg News Investing Reporter, walks through how Wall Street’s machine of silence stopped a #MeToo revolution. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News P&I Reporter Vernon Silver share insight on how Wall Street magic tricks make banks look safer than they are. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Zafran, Founding Partner and Co-CEO at IEQ Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
